ANALYSIS:
------------------------------------------------------------
✓ Fastest Algorithm: ECC P-256
✓ Slowest Algorithm: RSA-2048

SECURITY RECOMMENDATIONS:
------------------------------------------------------------
• For general data encryption: AES-256-GCM
• For key exchange: RSA-2048 or ECC P-256
• For digital signatures: ECC P-256

NOTES:
------------------------------------------------------------
• RC4 is considered cryptographically broken and should be avoided
• 3DES is being phased out and should be replaced with AES
• ECC provides similar security to RSA with smaller key sizes
